Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Inventory of the FoodItem Class, contains logic for the FoodItem class and is one of the two main classes in this project
    Since:
    jdk 11.0.5.10
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Aria Gomes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.util.ArrayList<FoodItem> inventory
      List of FoodItems that represents our inventory initialized at 20 elements
      private int numItems
      Number of items currently stored in the inventory
      private java.util.Formatter outputFile
      Formatter Object used to write inventory data to the external file

      • binarySearch

        public static int binarySearch(java.util.ArrayList<FoodItem> arr,
                               int x)
        Searches the ArrayList of type FoodItem for a specified value by splitting the Arraylist in half and searching through each half. The Time complexity for this method is O(log n)
        Parameters:
        arr - The array list of type FoodItem which will be binarySearched
        x - the value that will be searched for in the algorithm
        Returns:
        The index of the value we were looking for, if it does not exist the method will return -1
